content.html: “Sorry for the slow reply” is a symptom of unrealistic demands in an always-on culture. If you didn’t commit to a response deadline, stop apologizing and drop the guilt—you’re not late. A healthier message is gratitude for reasonable expectations: “Thanks for your patience.”
content.value:
“Sorry for the slow reply” is a symptom of unrealistic demands in an always-on culture.

If you didn’t commit to a response deadline, stop apologizing and drop the guilt—you’re not late.

A healthier message is gratitude for reasonable expectations: “Thanks for your patience.”
